籤詩版本二:
Gentleness has always prevailed over strength
Dajichang, the gate of good deeds
If someone divines this hexagram
Just like being thirsty for Yaojiang
詩意: This hexagram is a sign of kindness and gentleness. In everything, harmony is the norm.
解曰: Heaven and earth have feelings. Very true. God and Buddha protect you. Don’t forget what you got.
籤詩故事一:
◇Renzong recognized his mother
Song Zhenzong's concubine, Concubine Liu, was jealous of Concubine Li's birth of a son, Zhao Zhen, and bribed the midwife to replace Concubine Li's son with a skinned civet cat. Concubine Li was falsely accused of giving birth to a monster and was demoted to the cold palace. Concubine Liu was able to be enshrined. For later.
After Concubine De was promoted to empress, Concubine De set fire to the cold palace and planned to kill Concubine Li. Concubine Li escaped and lived among the people.
Concubine Li originally threw Zhao Zhen into the river, but fortunately he was rescued by the eunuch and sent to the Palace of the Eight Sages. When he grew up, he succeeded Song Renzong.
Later, Bao Zheng (Bao Qingtian) accidentally met the blind Concubine Li. When he learned the truth, he vigorously investigated the case, and finally the truth came to light, allowing Song Renzong to recognize Concubine Li as mother and son. Concubine Liu was thrown into the cold palace and Concubine Li was welcomed into the palace. The story ended successfully.
